SendSSHPublicKey.name: SendSSHPublicKey
SendSSHPublicKey.description:
Grants access to push an SSH public key to the specified EC2 instance to be used for
                                                standard SSH

SendSerialConsoleSSHPublicKey.name: SendSerialConsoleSSHPublicKey
SendSerialConsoleSSHPublicKey.description:
Grants access to push an SSH public key to the specified EC2 instance to be used for
                                                serial console SSH
